name: Small Batch No. 4
additionalNotes:
Dominican Puro 2006 vintage. Pelo de Oro wrapper. All tobaccos grown on on Litto's farm in La Canela, DR.  Initial distribution of 50 boxes with a total run of just 250 boxes of 105 cigars to be sold starting in Jan. 2012 at selected "Appointed Merchants."

http://www.cigarevents.com/2011/12/la-flor-dominicana-press-release-2/
